byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

abstract: Pakistan's military reports Taliban militants have killed at least 30 people at air force base near Peshawar, including 16 people in mosque; is first major assault on a Pakistani military base in 2015.
lead_paragraph: At least 16 people died in a mosque at the base, while 13 attackers were killed in the attack, near Peshawar, a Pakistani military spokesman said.

headline.main: Taliban Attack Kills 30 at Pakistan Air Force Base
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Taliban Kill 30 in Attack on Air Base Near Peshawar

snippet: At least 16 people died in a mosque at the base, while 13 attackers were killed in the attack, near Peshawar, a Pakistani military spokesman said.
